title: Prima facie evidence
context: ยง515-20 Prima facie evidence. In a proceeding under this chapter, a written, printed, or visual communication, advertisement, or other form of publication, or written inquiry, or record, or other document purporting to have been made by a person is prima facie evidence that it was authorized by the person. [L 1967, c 193, ยง20; HRS ยง515-20; gen ch 1985]
